titles.title: 16th International Workshop on Dark Side of the Universe 2021

short_description.value:
The 16th international workshop on the "Dark Side of the Universe" originally scheduled on 13-17 July 2020, has been cancelled due to Covid-19.
It is rescheduled to be held on 12-16 July 2021 at ICTP-EAIFR, in Kigali, Rwanda.

DSU are a series of international workshops bringing together a wide range of theorists and experimentalists to discuss current ideas on models of the dark side and relate them to current and future experiments. Topics covered include: dark matter, dark energy, cosmic rays, neutrino physics, gravitational waves, cosmology, astrophysical analysis of galactic halos, physics beyond the standard model, etc.
